sentence: Rob Portman endorsed Republican Jane Timken on Wednesday from among the crowded GOP field seeking the seat he is vacating next year.
author: Associated Press
title: GOP’s Rob Portman backs Timken to succeed him in US Senate

sentence: Rob Portman endorsed Republican Jane Timken on Wednesday from among the crowded GOP field seeking the seat he is vacating next year.
author: Julie Carr Smyth
title: GOP’s Rob Portman backs Timken to succeed him in US Senate

sentence: OAN Newsroom Ohio Senate candidate Jane Timken released a new ad in which she blamed President Joe Biden for the massive increase in inflation.
title: Senate candidate Timken says it’s time to balance the budget like Ohio families do
